panels.description: Percentage of updated vs desired replicas per Rollout to visualize progression.
panels.title: Canary/Blue-Green progress

panels.description: Shows controller reconcile latency percentiles to detect control-plane slowness.
panels.title: Reconcile latency p50/p95/p99

panels.description: This reports the Working Set Size (WSS), which is an estimate of the non-reclaimable memory (memory that cannot be easily freed by the kernel) actively being used by a container.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Shows error rate and 24h total for rollouts controller reliability.
panels.title: Reconcile errors
